ai_operations.reasoning: The primary focus was on splitting existing clusters based on project phases (planning, execution, review, approval) and distinct sub-topics within projects. This approach increased the cluster count significantly, creating more granular and focused discussions. No merging was deemed necessary as the existing clusters, while broad, represented distinct project efforts that benefited from further subdivision rather than combination.
